hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e export PATH=$PATH:/opt/cov-analysis/bin/ echo "Cleanup previous report" rm -rf reports/ rm -rf obj-arm-linux-androideabi cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
python client.py checkout
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug --verbose # Build Firefox for Android: ac_add_options --enable-application=mobile/android ac_add_options --target=arm-linux-androideabi
# With the following Android SDK and NDK: ac_add_options --with-android-sdk="/var/lib/jenkins/.mozbuild/android-sdk-linux/platforms/android-21" ac_add_options --with-android-ndk="/var/lib/jenkins/.mozbuild/android-ndk-r8e"
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j24" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
echo "Rebuild all" cov-configure --java --force-debug cov-build --dir cov-int ./mach --log-no-times build -v
tar zcvf cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
minimumsize=200000 actualsize=$(du -k cov-build.tar.gz | cut -f 1) if [ $actualsize -ge $minimumsize ]; then sh /opt/upload-to-coverity-fennec.sh else echo "Unexpected filesize. Should be at least $minimumsize (found $actualize)" exit 1 fi
rm -rf obj-arm-linux-androideabi cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/ exit 0
